about_the_game:
Cover art by:
Character Portraits by:



The kingdom has evolved, and luxuries once known only in story books have now become a reality. You want it all! However, all great people have their humble beginnings. Yours just happens to be smithing. Your beloved mother has left you her forge and you will now embark on a journey to make as much Groven as you can to claim your luxury.

With the aid of your uncle, you will grow as a blacksmith and ruins adventurer. All good smiths know the value of their materials, and you will risk life and limb to obtain them in randomly generated caves, as well as searching for priceless artifacts that your uncle is devoted to research. These materials will be used to create requested items that are posted as jobs on the local village bulletin board, and the more you smith and complete jobs, the more you grow. Who knows, maybe eventually you will attract the eye of some important people... whether they be good or bad.

Main gameplay features


  • Procedurally generated levels every time you enter the underground, where you can gather materials and perhaps find other treasures as you explore
  • Smithing competition against 2 AI that allows you to level up your smithing rank upon victory
  • Randomly generated jobs with varying rewards and types such as "high risk, high reward" where if you fail to meet the job deadline, you get heavily penalized, but the reward is multiplied. Jobs also scale with smithing rank
  • Paper Mario inspired bauble system where you can find various baubles as you play and each bauble has a unique gameplay boost, whether it be in combat or in the platforming
  • Random events that can appear on the overworld map, or at your forge, which may lead to reward, though some may require risk
  • Treasure maps that can lead to riches, resources or price-less treasures
  • 15 Crafting recipes for the forge, which can be found as you play
  • Real time combat that uses the dodge roll mechanic inspired by Enter the Gungeon and ability to combo strike or parry enemies with timed input presses

Features available in the final release


  • Upgrading your forge and building new buildings that will give you in-game benefits like storing items, storing money, scouting out available events, selling materials at higher prices, and more!
  • Hiring other smithies and having them craft items passively for you at your newly built forges! New hires have stats that make them different from one another, so choose carefully as a recruiter!
  • 3 Gambling minigames with the opportunity to weigh the dice in your favour, but be careful not to make it too obvious!
  • Unique quests that lead you to uncovering the greatest treasure of the ancient civilization that used to rule the land long ago!
  • Exploring the Kingdom of Groven, where the smithing championships are held, along with other services found in cities of such nature, like gambling, stock exchange, markets, and more!
  • More unique events, procedurally generated rooms, items and baubles!
  • The ultimate combat trial for those who wish to prove they have mastered the art of combat

Thank you for checking the page out, and if you like what you see, consider trying the free demo out and wish-listing :)

Early Beta Access

A free demonstration of the core game-play is free to download right now on steam :D Please consider checking it out if this is your type of game, and any feedback goes a very long way. Thank you :)

name: Groven
short_description: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!
